text: Mutually exclusive with "Ode to Miraculous Magic".
Summon a unit of Durthu's Wargrove (Treekin).
The ancient Treemen possess immense magical power, granting a powerful blessing to all those standing near them.
When Durthu’s allies are overwhelmed, they can call upon the Treekin of the forest to join the battle.
Using the forest as a weapon is a mandatory skill for every Wood Elf.
When the Twilight Maidens walk through the forest, they gather resources to replenish their equipment and restore their condition.
The blessing of Naestra imbues the Twilight Maidens with fervor, allowing them to see farther on the battlefield.
The blessing of Arahan makes the Twilight Maidens cold and unyielding, preparing them to stand firm in battle.
A special anthem inspires nearby allies, making them unstoppable on the battlefield.
Magical music that seems to have healing powers, mending the wounds and fatigue of nearby warriors.
The Druid uses magic to keep enemies distracted in a hallucinatory flower field.
Transform into a beast and deliver a deadly blow to the enemy.
